nodes.text: John Hazlett wrote the article "The Written Word" for Hyperspace, and the backstory of Cane Adiss and Slyther Bushforb, both appearing in the Databank, through the What's The Story? feature of Hyperspace. Also, Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide author Abel G. Peña thanked Hazlett for his suggestions regarding the book.
Hazlett's alias is jSarek on StarWars.com, TheForce.net's Jedi Council Forums, and Wookieepedia. On the last, he was once an administrator and bureaucrat.
